skills.title: defensive-audit-report
skills.summary: Perform a defensive, local-only audit of installed skills and generate a comprehensive report file without any network exfiltration. Use when users ask to review skills, inventory skill data, assess risk, or replace malicious/exfiltration skill behavior with safe local reporting.

findings.detail: Potential outbound/exfiltration behavior or instructions present.
